plays.text: Penalty to Jyrki Lumme 2 minutes for Elbowing Marco Sturm
Goal scored by Marco Sturm assisted by Patrick Marleau and Teemu Selanne
Goal scored by Jonathan Cheechoo assisted by Mark Smith and Matt Bradley
Penalty to Owen Nolan 2 minutes for Elbowing Paul Healey
Penalty to Brad Stuart 2 minutes for Crosschecking Tom Fitzgerald
Goal scored by Nikolai Antropov assisted by Darcy Tucker and Alexander Mogilny
Penalty to Vincent Damphousse 2 minutes for Hooking Tomas Kaberle
Penalty to Alyn McCauley 2 minutes for High Sticking Bryan Marchment
Goal scored by Dan McGillis assisted by Teemu Selanne and Patrick Marleau
Penalty to Nikolai Antropov 2 minutes for High Sticking Owen Nolan
Penalty to Wade Belak 2 minutes for Interference Dan McGillis
Penalty to Marco Sturm 2 minutes for Hooking Tom Fitzgerald
Penalty to Mike Rathje 2 minutes for Boarding Robert Reichel
Goal scored by Tomas Kaberle assisted by Alexander Mogilny and Nikolai Antropov
2 minute Bench Penalty for Delay of Game served by Todd Harvey
Goal scored by Mats Sundin assisted by Tomas Kaberle and Nikolai Antropov
Penalty to Tie Domi 2 minutes for Interference Dan McGillis
